resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108480</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108480</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770213005</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Virtual Car: Velocity and Acceleration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Virtuelles Auto: Geschwindigkeit und 
Beschleunigung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voiture Virtuelle : Vitesse et 
accélération</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Carro Virtual: Velocidade e acceleration</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Automobile Virtuale: Velocità ed 
accelerazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικονικό αυτοκίνητο: Ταχύτητα και ταχύτητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Coche Virtual: Velocidad y aceleración</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Take control of a virtual car and learn how vectors are used to represent velocity and acceleration in this interactive activity developed for Teachers' Domain. Grades 6-12.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nehmen Sie Steuerung eines virtuellen Autos und 
erlernen Sie, wie Vektoren verwendet werden, um Geschwindigkeit und 
Beschleunigung in dieser interaktiven Aktivität darzustellen, die 
für Gebiet der Lehrer entwickelt wird. Grade 6-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Prenez la commande d'une voiture virtuelle et 
apprenez comment des vecteurs sont employés pour représenter la 
vitesse et l'accélération dans cette activité interactive 
développée pour le domaine des professeurs. Catégories 6-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Faça exame do controle de um carro virtual e 
aprenda como os vetores são usados representar a velocidade e o 
acceleration nesta atividade interativa desenvolvida para o domínio 
dos professores. Classes 6-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prenda il controllo di un automobile virtuale ed 
impari come i vettori sono usati per rappresentare la velocità e 
l'accelerazione in questa attività interattiva sviluppata per il 
settore degli insegnanti. Gradi 6-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πάρτε τον έλεγχο ενός εικονικού αυτοκινήτου και 
μάθετε πώς τα διανύσματα χρησιμοποιούνται για να αντιπροσωπεύσουν
την ταχύτητα και την ταχύτητα σε αυτήν την διαλογική 
δραστηριότητα που αναπτύσσεται για τη δικτυακή γειτονιά των 
δασκάλων. Βαθμοί 6-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tome el control de un coche virtual y aprenda 
cómo los vectores se utilizan para representar velocidad y la 
aceleración en esta actividad interactiva desarrollada para el 
dominio de los profesores. Grados 6-12.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:WGBH EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION
FN:WGBH EDUCATIONAL FOUNDATION
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770213005</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108480</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/virtual-car-velocity-and-acceleration</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
